<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Speedy Rituals](/Feats.aspx?ID=2046) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ritualist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=72)

**Prerequisites**
[Efficient Rituals](/Feats.aspx?ID=2044)

</column>

---

You can perform [rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=777) in only a fraction of the usual time. If a ritual has a casting time measured in days, you can cast it in an equal number of hours. If this results in a ritual longer than 8 hours, you split the ritual between multiple days, as normal for a ritual.
name: Speedy Rituals
